docs.abstract: New York City FC, team that will enter Major League Soccer in 2015, will reportedly play its first three seasons at Yankee Stadium; team is jointly owned by the New York Yankees and Manchester City of England's Premier League.

docs.snippet: Liverpool are close to a first league title since 1990 but Steven Gerrard's tears after Sunday's win over Manchester City were a mix of joy and sadness, the 3-2 triumph coming close to the anniversary of one of English football's darkest days....
